statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_condition = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_condition = 'Good' OR quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_condition FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%hammer%' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse 1';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, technician FROM equipment_inventory LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id

SELECT equipment_name, unit_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE unit_price < 500 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, jersey_number, team_id FROM TeamPlayers WHERE team_id = 1;
